Atlanta.Opera Nightclub:
Opera Nightclub is a nightclub located in Midtown Atlanta, Georgia, United States. It is Atlanta's most popular and successful nightclub in terms of revenue and attendance and has also been featured in Nightclub & Bar's Top 50 Clubs in the United States for 2015. 
Since opening in 2007, the venue has been host to internationally renowned DJs including Armin van Buuren, Paul van Dyk, and Tiesto.
